participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Curious and talkative, with a love for sharing personal stories and interests.
participant_1.background: i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i love cats and have two cats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outspoken, with a strong dislike for math but a passion for sports.
participant_2.background: i hate math class. my brother is older than me. i am on the soccer team. i am 13 years old.
